TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ToolStripManager extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制 的呈現和浮動定位，以及 、 和 物件的合併。

span.span: Controls rendering and rafting, and the merging of , , and objects.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援-相關工作，對於整個應用程式，例如合併、 設定和轉譯器的選項。 supports -related tasks for entire applications, such as merging, settings, and renderer options. 多載方法結合彼此，以及與多載的控制項方法復原合併作業。The overloaded method combines controls with each other, and the overloaded method undoes a merge operation. 使用類別搭配類別，以取得更多的控制權和自訂能力繪製和配置樣式。Use the class with the class to gain even more control and customizability over painting and layout style. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範功能表項目合併的一般的案例。The following code example demonstrates all the typical scenarios of menu item merging. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫和它的某些成員。The following code example demonstrates a call to and some of its members. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的快速鍵都是透過 F12 單獨; 函式索引鍵 F1使用 CTRL、 ALT 或 shift 鍵修飾詞; 的功能鍵或 CTRL、 ALT 或 shift 鍵修飾詞與其他索引鍵。Valid shortcut keys are the function keys F1 through F12 alone; function keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers; or other keys with CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT modifiers. CTRL、 ALT 或 SHIFT 鍵和函式金鑰以外的索引鍵不是有效的快速鍵如果單獨使用。CTRL, ALT, or SHIFT keys and keys other than function keys are not valid shortcut keys if used alone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項不在設計的表單上的時間儲存設定就會自時載入設定。 controls that are not on the form at design time when the settings are saved are removed from the when the settings are loaded. 重設的設定，標記為註解行，並保留列。To reset the settings, comment out the line and leave the line. 這將不會載入任何設定，並將保存的最後一個狀態。This will not load any settings and will persist the last state. 當您移除註解從列中，將會套用這些設定。When you remove the comment from the line, those settings will be applied.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合類型的物件相同，例如物件與其他物件物件與其他物件，並依此類推。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. 使用方法來結合不同類型的物件。Use the method to combine objects of different types. 屬性必須設為`true`同時物件，以及來源和目標類型必須相同，或這個方法會傳回`false`。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, and the source and target types must be identical, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果有兩個上設定的 MDI 子表單的控制項要`true`父表單的內容合併的其中之一控制項。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用合併的其他子內容MDI 父表單上的控制項。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form.

span.span: The or parameter is .

exception.span: 或 參數參考相同的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法來結合不同類型的物件。Use the method to combine objects of different types. 使用方法來結合類型的物件相同，例如物件與其他物件物件與其他物件，並依此類推。Use the method to combine objects of identical type, such as objects with other objects, objects with other objects, and so on. 屬性必須設為`true`同時物件或這個方法會傳回`false`。The property must be set to `true` for both objects, or this method returns `false`. > [!NOTE] > 如果有兩個上設定的 MDI 子表單的控制項要`true`父表單的內容合併的其中之一控制項。If there are two controls on an MDI child form, setting to `true` for the parent form merges the contents of only one of the controls. 使用合併的其他子內容MDI 父表單上的控制項。Use to merge the contents of additional child controls on the MDI parent form. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會合併指定的選項為基礎的功能表項目。The following code example merges menu items based on specified choices. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. span.span: Saves settings for the specified using the specified settings key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項不在設計的表單上的時間儲存設定就會自時載入設定。 controls that are not on the form at design time when the settings are saved are removed from the when the settings are loaded. 重設的設定，標記為註解行，並保留列。To reset the settings, comment out the line and leave the line. 這將不會載入任何設定，並將保存的最後一個狀態。This will not load any settings and will persist the last state. 當您移除註解從列中，將會套用這些設定。When you remove the comment from the line, those settings will be applied.
